Josh Van de Walle The UsergController manages behavior related to users and credentials

    • handleRegisterUser

      @PostMapping("/handleRegister") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView handleRegisterUser​(@Valid @ModelAttribute("user") @Valid User user, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result)
      Handles register and redirects to login.
      Parameters:
      credentials - Credentials the credentials to attempt to login
      result - the validation result
      Returns:
      ModelAndView login + credentials mav

    • handleLoginUser

      @PostMapping("/handleLogin") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView handleLoginUser​(@Valid @ModelAttribute("credentials") @Valid Credentials credentials, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result)
      Handles login and redirects to home. Sets the HTTP session variables.
      Parameters:
      credentials - Credentials the credentials to attempt to login
      result - the validation result
      Returns:
      ModelAndView home + credentials mav
